Dialogue: Hello there! Are you my brother?
I've been looking for him for so long . . . you know, I think you must be him.
Brother. I need you to fell a tree for me. It's most important.
Come see me when you have some timber to show your big bro!
Aha! I knew I could trust my brother to bring me some good timber.
What a lovely day it is have some kindling and a brotherly connection!
